items.title: Fix RackBay facilityId TS error
items.reason: Smoke test only — real fix needed in radl codebase

items.title: Fix Team create facility relation TS error
items.reason: Smoke test only — real fix needed in radl codebase

items.title: Prisma client regeneration needed at build time
items.reason: Generated types were stale — facilityId showed as required instead of optional. Fixed with prisma generate but gitignored files won't persist.

items.title: verifyFacilityAdmin duplicated in activity route
items.reason: Same auth pattern duplicated in 6+ facility routes — extract to shared helper

items.title: Multi-child parent dashboard
items.reason: Dashboard only shows first linked athlete; multi-child support deferred

items.title: Contact Coach button in parent empty state
items.reason: Low priority UX enhancement for parent with no linked athlete

items.title: Extract dashboard data fetching branches
items.reason: Dashboard page.tsx approaching 400 lines; could extract coach/parent/athlete branches

items.title: aria-labels for icon-only buttons
items.reason: ~60-80 buttons need labels, estimated 3-5 hours of careful audit

items.title: Oversized components (15 files >400 lines)
items.reason: Requires careful refactoring judgment per component, not mechanical

items.title: Component/E2E test coverage
items.reason: Zero component tests currently, large effort needs dedicated sprint

items.title: Remaining 14 mutation routes without Zod
items.reason: Most are action-only (no body to validate), low risk

items.title: ConfirmDialog unit tests
items.reason: No existing test patterns for shared UI components — better as part of a test coverage sprint

items.title: ConfirmDialog CSS variable destructive colors
items.reason: Hardcoded red-600 works for now, should use theme variables when theming is revisited

items.title: Date range validation on practice duplication
items.reason: Medium priority from security review — coach could create practices with unreasonable dates

items.title: Improve error handling in checklist dismiss
items.reason: Medium priority from security review — errors silently swallowed

items.title: Extract parent dashboard queries to separate module
items.reason: page.tsx approaching 500+ lines — code review recommended extraction

items.title: Add resource caching with TTL
items.reason: MEDIUM security review finding - subprocess spawning on every resource read. Low risk for single-user stdio MCP.

items.title: Extract shared test mock utility
items.reason: LOW code review finding - mock server pattern duplicated across 9 test files.

items.title: Add Zod .max() constraints to prompt arguments
items.reason: LOW security review finding - string args have no length limits.

items.title: Make file paths configurable via env vars
items.reason: MEDIUM code review finding - hardcoded /home/hb paths reduce portability.

items.title: Google Calendar MCP OAuth setup
items.reason: Requires user to create OAuth credentials in Google Cloud Console — blocking dependency

items.title: Gmail briefing delivery via Google Workspace MCP
items.reason: Blocked on Google OAuth setup

items.title: Critical alert system via Gmail
items.reason: Blocked on Google OAuth setup — needs Gmail send capability

items.title: Production status test coverage — behavioral tests
items.reason: Code reviewer flagged smoke-only tests, need proper mocking of fetch calls
